1.「ただいまより 第１回| アストルティア・クイーン コンテストに| 参加する う: I'd like to introduce you to the beautiful|women who will be participating in the first|ever Astrutia Queen Contest!

2.「オーグリード大陸に咲く 一輪の赤いバラ！| どんな豪傑も 気安く近づけば返り討:
A single red rose blooms on the continent of|Aughrid! If you approach her with impunity,|she will strike back! A brilliant woman of|
|power and beauty...

4.「こんな盛大なイベントに参加できて 光栄だわ。| 強敵ばかりだけど これは 真剣:
It's a pleasure to be part of such a grand|event. I know I'm up against a lot of tough|competition, but this is serious business...|
|I'm going to win the title of queen!

5.「風の町アズランに ひっそりと咲く 月見草！| その つぶらな瞳は 見る者をとり:
In the windy town of Azran, the evening|primrose blooms in secret! Its dull eyes|captivate all who see them! The idol of the|
|Kamshika people...

7.「お父さまが 勝手に応募しちゃったけど| わ…私なんかが 勝てるのかな？| みん: Your father took the liberty of applying, but|I... I don't know if I can win. I'm so|embarrassed. I'm so embarrassed.

8.「あたしのゼニは あたしの物！| あんたのゼニも あたしの物！| その若さに似合: My money is mine! Your money is mine too!|You're the worst kind of miser for someone so|young...

10.「こら！ お金のことしか言ってないで！: Come on! All you ever talk about is money!

11.「てへへっ。あたしを クイーンにしたってや。| クイーンになって この城を もら: And... You made me a queen... You made me a|queen and you gave me this castle. And then I|rented it out and paid for it...

12.「こら！ まだ 言い終わってないで！: Come on! Don't finish what you're saying!

13.「ウェナ諸島に平安をもたらす 美しきディーバ！| その歌声に ウェディたちはメロ:
A beautiful diva who brings peace to the Wena|Islands! The Weddies are going to love her|voice! I never thought I'd see a real|
|queen...

15.「クイーン コンテストと聞いては| わらわが参加しないワケには いくまい。| 本: When I heard about the Queen's Contest, I|couldn't help but join in. To see the majesty|of a true queen...

16.「岳都ガタラを駆け抜ける 黒い影！| 今夜のエモノは あなたのハート！| 天知る:
A black shadow runs through the mountain city|of Gathara! Tonight's prize is your heart!|Know the heavens! Know the earth! People|
|know...

17.「美少女怪盗ポイックリン！| 華麗に 参上でございますわっ！: The beautiful girl thief, Poicelin! She's|making a grand entrance!

18.「私に盗めぬ物は なし！| クイーンの座も 華麗に盗んでみせますわ！| ドワーフ: There's nothing I can't steal! I'll steal the|queen's throne with flying colors! I look|forward to working with you, Dwarves!

19.「すべての男は 私に ひれ伏す！| 彼女に打ちのめされた旅人は 数知れず！| た: Every man has bowed down to me! She has been|the downfall of countless travelers! I'm|looking for a servant...

21.「ふん……。時間のムダね。| こんなコンテストなんか やるまでもないわ。| クイ: Hmm... Time... We don't have to do this|contest... I'm the one who's gonna be queen.

22.「そこの あなた！| いいわね？ あたしを選ぶのよ。| あたしに ひざまずけるな: You there! Are you ready? I'm the one...|Isn't it an honor to have you kneel before|me?

23.「ジュレットの町に舞い降りた 心優しき天使！| 彼女に頼まれたら 誰も断れない！: A kind-hearted angel has landed in the town|of Juliet! No one can say no to her if she|asks! Can I be your sister?

26.「クイーンになれば お友達が増えるかなって。| だから コンテストに参加してみた: I thought if I became queen, I'd have more|friends... That's why I decided to enter the|contest... I hope you'll support me.

27.「フランクな口調が チャームポイント！| その明るさで みんなの心を わしづかみ:
His frank tone is his charm point! That|person who won everyone's heart with her|cheerfulness has unexpectedly joined us from|
|heaven!

28.「天然☆予知っ娘ママ アルウェ王妃！: Queen Aruwe, the natural and predictive mama!

30.「あたしはぁ アルウェ王妃ちゃん様でーす。| あたしぃ 予知っ娘だから 結果は|: I'm Queen Arwë... I'm a girl of premonitions,|so I can see the outcome, but I can't tell|you...

31.「すべてのスーパースターが 彼女に嫉妬する| １００年にひとりの 天才！| その: All the superstars are jealous of her, the|one genius in a century! The way she dances,|she's a knockout!

33.「なぜ あたしが クイーンに選ばれるのか……| それは あたしが プレシアンナだ: I don't know why I'm being chosen as queen| That's because I'm a Prescianna<heart>You know how they say a top star can never be|defeated?

34.「あこがれの いやし系お姉様！| ああ！ そのムネに抱かれて 眠りたい……！|: I've always dreamed of a soothing big sister!|Oh! I want to sleep in your arms. The dark|horse of this tournament...

36.「あっはっはっは！ 他の連中は やせっぽちで| 全然 女としての魅力が 足りない: Ha-ha-ha! The rest of them are skinny and not|at all attractive as women!

37.「いいかい！ クイーンに必要なのは| すべてを包み込む 包容力と決まってるのさ！: You know what? A queen needs to be able to|take it all in! Let's play this game.<heart>

38.「以上 １０名の美女たちが| クイーンの座を賭けて コンテストを争います。: These are the 10 beautiful women who will be|competing for the title of queen...

39.「果たして 栄光の座に かがやくのは| 誰なのか！？| それを決めるのは あなた: Who will emerge on the throne of glory? It's|up to you to decide!

40.「どうですか <pc>さん。| お気に入りの美女は 見つかりましたか？: what do you think?<pc> I'd like to thank you all. Did you find your|favorite beauty?

41.「クイーンにふさわしいと思う 美女が決まったら| その方から チョコを受け取って:
Once you have chosen a beautiful woman whom|you feel is worthy of being queen, she will|be the one to receive the chocolates. But|
|only one of you will receive the chocolate!

42.「あなたが チョコを受け取った相手に| あなたの一票が 投じられるのです。| よ: Your vote will be cast for the person who|receives the chocolate. Please think|carefully about your choice.

43.「ただいまより 第１回| アストルティア・クイーン コンテストの| 結果発表を: We will now announce the results of the first|ever Astrutia Queen Contest!

44.「この ショコラフォンテヌ城の| クイーンの座は いったい 誰の手に！？| その: Who will be the queen of the Chocolat|Fontenay castle? The outcome will be revealed|at last!

45.「皆さま！ ステージに ご注目ください！: Ladies and gentlemen! Please pay attention to|the stage!

46.「選び終わりましたら お話がありますので| 私の所に お立ち寄りください。| 外: When you've finished making your selections,|please stop by my office so we can talk. I'll|be outside. I'll be right with you.
